ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

::DarkMouse::

She finally stopped running and looked around.  She saw a hollow log 
laying among a small, thick grove of trees.  She crawled into the log 
and curled up.  She put the rat down next to her. She whispered, "Now 
you stay still my little one, or we may be slagged.  I just hope that 
no one saw me duck in here.  I just hope that I lost them in the 
forest."  She was fearful that if caught, they would kill her. Or 
worse, kill her pet and then her.  She knew she was a pred, but she 
didn't feel much like one. What she did feel, was scared.
